stimulusHtml: The changes in artistic practices during the Amarna period that are exemplified by Akhenaton, Nefertiti, and three daughters were most likely caused by

choicesHtml: increased contact with distant cultures through trade

the introduction of new religious beliefs
the invasion of Egypt by a foreign power
